StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetPSRS]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @PSRSOrgUnitID int )
AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT PSRS.PSROrgUnitID as PSRSOrgUnitID, PSRS.PSROrgUnitTypeID as PSRSOrgUnitTypeID, PSRS.Descrip.on as PSRSDescrip.on, REGION.PSROrgUnitID as REGIONOrgUnitID, REGION.PSROrgUnitTypeID as REGIONOrgUnitTypeID, REGION.Descrip.on as REGIONDescrip.on, MCRC.PSROrgUnitID as MCRCOrgUnitID, MCRC.PSROrgUnitTypeID as MCRCOrgUnitTypeID, MCRC.Descrip.on as MCRCDescrip.on FROM [dbo].[vwOrgUnitIDs] vw join [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] PSRS ON vw.RS = PSRS.PSROrgUnitID join [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] REGION ON vw.Region = REGION.PSROrgUnitID join [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] MCRC ON vw.HQ = MCRC.PSROrgUnitID WHERE [RS] = @PSRSOrgUnitID
